data.text:
Do you have a passion for dancing and would absolutely like nothing more than a vacation where indulging your passion is the center of attention? Our professional company provides tour guides that know just where to go in order to see that you have the time of your life! When hiring one of our personable, capable, guides you are assured that an optimum travel agenda will be arranged to meet the expectations of you and your companions. Dance workshops as well as dancing shows pave the way for you to hone your skills by learning unfamiliar dances as well as improve style and fluency in the dances you are already familiar with.

Imagine traveling to Italy and learning the steps to regional classic dances such as the Tarantella from Puglia, which is a well-known upbeat folk dance from southern Italy. The Sardinian Ballu Tundu (round dance) dates back to the early 1800s and the Neapolitan Saltarello is can be traced all the way back to the 14th century. Or perhaps venture to Argentina where you can lose yourself in the past by practicing Chamame. This is a dance that is known to the northeast part of the country similar to the Waltz but quicker. Cuartero is a dance where the performers move counter-clockwise in a circular motion. The Chacerera has folk roots and was generated from northwestern Argentina. Maybe even journey to Greece to master the popular traditional Kalamatiano originating in the southern Greece city, Kalamata, the ancient Horos, and Pentozali from Crete dances.

On our excursions travelers get so much more than they ever could have possibly imagined and we look forward to doing the same for you, too. When allowing us to be your guide we will make sure you are completely immersed in the atmospheres of these countries. On your tour you will undoubtedly marvel at the scenery and savor local recipes of each region while dining at fabulous restaurants. We will organize fun yet relaxing vacation lodging accommodations that permit our guests to make the most out of their treks. Importantly, our establishment always arranges to have an even number of people traveling when putting tours together to ensure that every guest will have a dancing partner.

Your dream of dancing all over the map can be turned into a tangible reality simply at your request. Please contact our site soon in order to arrange a totally exciting and memorable vacation dance tour for you. We will be certain that you are all set to dance to your heartâ€™s delight while meeting new people and experiencing the world. Thank you for your consideration and we hope to be of service to you in the near future.
